resources.string: The tile will only display the state of Battery Saver when this is on.
Toggle Battery Saver by tapping on the tile.

To enable this, you\'ll need to grant the app permission to do modify system settings. To do that, connect your phone to your computer with USB debugging enabled, and issue the following command via ADB:
Once you\'ve done that, you\'ll be able to enable this setting.

Android doesn't natively support apps changing the state of Battery Saver, and as such, this feature is experimental as of now.

The workaround the app uses can cause the Android System to no longer be able to control the Battery Saver setting after tapping the tile, meaning that things like the system Battery Saver tile won't work.

If you encounter this, tapping this tile (the tile from this app) again to restore the Battery Saver setting to its previous state should fix it.
